blocks.name: islinds5
blocks.content: A set is linearly independent if and only if it has no non-trivial representations of zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2023.)

blocks.name: lindspropd
blocks.content: Property deduction for linearly independent sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm lindspropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clinds, c0), cfv(clinds, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c1), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cfv(clinds, c0), cfv(clinds, c1), w0)
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clinds, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clinds, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wbr(cres(cid, cv(hs0)), clindf, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wbr(cres(cid, cv(hs0)), clindf, c1)))
  anbi12d(w0, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wbr(cres(cid, cv(hs0)), clindf, c0), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wbr(cres(cid, cv(hs0)), clindf, c1))
  sseq2d(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), w0)
  lindfpropd(s0, s1, cres(cid, cv(hs0)), c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, w0)
  resiexd(cv(hs0), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clinds, c0)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wbr(cres(cid, cv(hs0)), clindf, c0))), wcel(c0, c2))
  islinds(c0, c2, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clinds, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wbr(cres(cid, cv(hs0)), clindf, c1))), wcel(c1, c3))
  islinds(c1, c3, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clinds, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clinds, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cres.s(s0, cid, cv(hs0))
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cres.s(s1, cid, cv(hs0))
  diff.cid.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm lindspropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(LIndS ` c0)=(LIndS ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Base `(Scalar ` c0))=(Base `(Scalar ` c1)))

  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0))‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0))‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))‚Üí(s0[(√ó ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(√ó ` c1)]s1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (LIndS ` c0), (LIndS ` c1), w0)
  3bitr4d(w0, hs0 ‚àà(LIndS ` c0), hs0 ‚àà(LIndS ` c1), (hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c0)‚àß(= |` hs0)[LIndF]c0), (hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1)‚àß(= |` hs0)[LIndF]c1))
  anbi12d(w0, hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c0), (= |` hs0)[LIndF]c0, hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1), (= |` hs0)[LIndF]c1)
  sseq2d(hs0, (Base ` c0), (Base ` c1), w0)
  lindfpropd(s0, s1, (= |` hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, w0)
  resiexd(hs0, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  syl(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(LIndS ` c0)‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c0)‚àß(= |` hs0)[LIndF]c0)), c0 ‚àà c2)
  islinds(c0, c2, hs0, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  syl(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(LIndS ` c1)‚Üî(hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1)‚àß(= |` hs0)[LIndF]c1)), c1 ‚àà c3)
  islinds(c1, c3, hs0, (Base ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((LIndS ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((LIndS ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cres.s(s0, cid, hs0)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cres.s(s1, cid, hs0)
  diff.cid.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
